info.title: Leforce  API
info.description:
Leforce API После загрузки проекта: Настроить .env composer update php artisan key:generate php artisan migrate php artisan storage:link версия PHP: 7.4.16
версия MySQL: 8.0.23-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
Использованные пакеты: "classic-o/nova-media-library" "digitalcloud/multilingual-nova" drobee/nova-sluggable whitecube/nova-flexible-content optimistdigital/nova-sortable Contact the developer
Apache 2.0

post.description: Check if number and email used and sending verification code.
Register with client data and code
Send code for login by phone

get.description: Get catalog data with categories and single products.

session_cart.description: Required if no auth on api
Required if no auth on api

redirect_url.description: Link where user should be redirected

bonus_subtract.description: Can be used only of user authenticated and bonuses available

insurance_sum.description: оценочная стоимость товара для расчета суммы страховки

cod_sum.description: сумма наложенного платежа, которую курьерская компания возьмёт с покупателя, следует передавать стоимость доставки + стоимость товаров в случае если оплата при получении

get.summary: Get messages list for client or create new client instance

client_id.description: Id of client - from DB or generated
Client id if already exists, else will be created new instance

post.summary: Send message from client to operator

main_image.description: Array of images for two-side photos

code.description: Verification code. Sended only if environment not in production mode.

key.description: Array of errors (general only with 1 element inside)
